summary: Chronicling the turmoil and pandemonium that ensues at a derelict university sumo club, and the rise of some unlikely heroes.
cast: Masahiro Motoki|Misa Shimizu|Naoto Takenaka|Akira Emoto|Kaori Mizushima|Hiromasa Taguchi|Robert Hoffman|Kentarô Sakai|Masaaki Takarai|Ritsuko Umemoto|Masaru Matsuda|Hiroshi Miyasaka|Gorô Kataoka|Naomasa Musaka|Fuyuki Murakami|Mutsuko Sakura
title: Shiko funjatta
